00029 #ifndef LUBYK_INCLUDE_MDNS_REGISTRATION_H_
00030 #define LUBYK_INCLUDE_MDNS_REGISTRATION_H_
00031 
00032 #include "mdns/AbstractRegistration.h"
00033 
00034 #include "lubyk.h"
00035 using namespace lubyk;
00036 
00037 
00038 namespace mdns {
00039 
00046 class Registration : public AbstractRegistration, public LuaObject
00047 {
00048 public:
00049 
00050   Registration(const char *service_type, const char *name, uint port, const char *txt)
00051       : AbstractRegistration(service_type, name, port, txt) {
00052   }
00053 
00054   ~Registration() {
00055   }
00056 
00057   int fd() {
00058     return fd_;
00059   }
00060 
00061 
00064   LuaStackSize getService(lua_State *L) {
00065     if (!AbstractRegistration::getService()) {
00066       // TODO: Something went wrong, we should return nil, error ?
00067       return 0;
00068     }
00069     // create table {name = 'x', host = '10.0.0.34', port = 7500}
00070     lua_newtable(L);
00071     // name = 'xxxx'
00072     lua_pushstring(L, "name");
00073     lua_pushstring(L, name_.c_str());
00074     lua_settable(L, -3);
00075     // host = 'gaspard.local' / '10.3.4.5'
00076     lua_pushstring(L, "host");
00077     lua_pushstring(L, host_.c_str());
00078     lua_settable(L, -3);
00079     // port = 7890
00080     lua_pushstring(L, "port");
00081     lua_pushnumber(L, port_);
00082     lua_settable(L, -3);
00083     // <table>
00084     return 1;
00085   }
00086 
00087 };
00088 } // mdns
00089 
00090 #endif // LUBYK_INCLUDE_MDNS_REGISTRATION_H_
